description: T.2 Yew - 1.5m Lateral reduction from building & deadwood. T.3 Pine - Remove lowest 3 branches & deadwood. T.4 Pine - Remove lowest 2 branches.T.6 Oak - Crown lift secondary branches only to 5m from ground level & laterally reduce lower branches overhanging neighbour's property by up to 3m to suitable growth points.
